thread.title: Poll: 'Fruit shaking' in city parks might be strange, but is it a crime?
thread.title_full: Poll: 'Fruit shaking' in city parks might be strange, but is it a crime? - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Poll: 'Fruit shaking' in city parks might be strange, but is it a crime?
text: Nobody 's quite sure what kind of fruit was being shaken down in a city park on Tuesday, but Bethlehem police said a 67-year-old woman from New York broke the law when she shook an ornamental tree and used a stick try to get at the berries,
